definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: Philistine, (oi/) Fulistieim; and (not in Hex) (o/) a)llo/fulov, (oi/) a)llo/fuloi;—only as subst.: ´[[הַפּ]] the Philistine (Goliath) slain by David 1Sa 17:8 + 27 t. 1Sa 17, 1Sa 18:6, 1Sa 19:5, 1Sa 21:10, 1Sa 22:10; one slain byAbishai 2Sa 21:17; elsewhere pl. the Philistines,:255 usu. [[פְּלִשְׁתִּים]] without art., rarely ´[[הַפּח]] 1Sa 4:7, 1Sa 7:13 + (esp. c. prep. ´[[בַּפּ]] v:1Sa 7:13 +, and then perh. due to punctuators), Ge 10:14 = 1Ch 1:12, Ge 26:14, Ge 26:15, Ge 26:18, Ju Jdg 3:31 + 33 t. Ju, 1Sa 4:1, 1Sa 4:1 + 118 t. 1 S, 2Sa 1:20 + 28 t. 2 S, +; ´[[אֶרֶץ פ]] Ge 21:32, Ge 21:34 + 12 t.; ´[[שְׂדֵה פ]] 1Sa 6:1, 1Sa 27:7, 1Sa 27:11; ´[[מֶלֶח פ]] Ge 26:1, Ge 26:8; ´[[שָׂרֵי פ]] 1Sa 18:30 + 5 t.; ´[[סַרְנֵי פ]] Jos 13:3, Ju Jdg 3:3 + 13 t.; ´[[יָם פ]] Ex 23:31; ´[[אֱלֽהֵי פ]] Ju Jdg 10:6.—Cf. [[כְּרֵתִי]], II. [[כַּפְתּוֹר]]. On Philistines v. also WMM:As.u. Eur.387 f. Evans:Cretan Pictographs, 100 ff. Schwally: ZWT xxxiv.103 f., 255.
